Sure, here are the PDDL actions based on the provided task and steps:

Task: Grow a Rose Bush from Rose Bush Cuttings

Steps:
- prepare_area clipping
- take_cutting clipping
- dip_in_hormide npc
- plant_cutting clipping

Descriptions:
- Prepare the pot or area in your yard where you plan to plant your clipping.
- Take a cutting from the rose bush you would like to grow your new bush from.
- Moisten the part of the clipping that you just scraped and dip it into rooting hormone.
- Immediately plant the cutting.

PDDL Actions:

```lisp
(:action prepare_area
    :parameters (?area - location ?p - player)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?area) (not (prepared ?area)))
    :effect (prepared ?area)
)

(:action take_cutting
    :parameters (?cutting - clipping ?bush - rose_bush ?p - player)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?bush) (not (has_cutting ?p ?cutting)) (is_part_of ?cutting ?bush))
    :effect (and (has_cutting ?p ?cutting) (not (is_part_of ?cutting ?bush)))
)

(:action dip_in_hormide
    :parameters (?cutting - clipping ?hormide - rooting_hormide ?p - player)
    :precondition (and (has_cutting ?p ?cutting) (at ?p ?hormide) (not (dipped_in_hormide ?cutting)))
    :effect (dipped_in_hormide ?cutting)
)

(:action plant_cutting
    :parameters (?cutting - clipping ?area - location ?p - player)
    :precondition (and (has_cutting ?p ?cutting) (prepared ?area) (at ?p ?area) (dipped_in_hormide ?cutting))
    :effect (and (planted ?cutting ?area) (not (has_cutting ?p ?cutting)))
)
```

These actions should capture the intent and logic of each step described in the task of growing a rose bush from cuttings.
